overview:
Amir is a user experience consultant with eight years of experience in the software industry. His mission is to help companies innovate by integrating design thinking into the product life-cycle. His designs deliver a blend of usability, simplicity, and elegance.

Over the past years, Amir has helped several companies create new products and redesign existing ones. His portfolio includes work with UStream, blist, Delve Networks, Colligent, and DocVerse.

Prior to working in user experience, Amir worked as a program manager, software engineer, and research assitant. His design process draws upon his experience from all these roles.

Amir holds a Master’s in Human Computer Interaction and a Bachelor’s in Computer Science.
